original_text: We see that Abraham was waiting to live in God's special place. That is the city that God himself has built. God has made it very strong so that it will be there for ever.
korean_text: 이는 그가 하나님이 계획하시고 지으실 터가 있는 성을 바랐음이라

sentences.original_text: We see that Abraham was waiting
to live in God's special place
God has made it very strong
so that it will be there for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 영원히 그곳에 있게 하기 위함입니다
